alert.note: Alert for Appling; Jeff Davis (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 18 at 5:48PM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Jeff Davis and northwestern Appling Counties through 615 PM EDT... At 548 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Uvalda, or 8 miles northeast of Hazlehurst, moving south at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds around 40 mph, pea size hail, and minor flooding due to heavy rainfall. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Minor flooding due to heavy rainfall is possible. Locations impacted include... Hazlehurst and Graham. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
